name: arcane
description: Arcane is an open-source, privacy-first chat and automation platform designed for teams. It offers a Slack-like interface with channels, tasks, and workflows, and can be self-hosted for better data ownership.
features: Team Chat: Privacy-first communication platform with Slack-like interface. Collaborate securely.
Channels: Organize conversations by topic, project, or team. Structured communication.
Task Management: Integrated tasks and workflows within chat context. Work where you talk.
Automation: Build custom workflows and bots for team productivity. Automate repetitive work.
Self-Hosted: Complete data ownership and control over communications. Your conversations, your server.
Open Source: Transparent, auditable code you can trust and customize. No vendor lock-in.
